Description.p: A set of codes to indicate the Child Protection Information Sharing (CP-IS) service's response to a request for the upload of a record.

concept.displayName: PDS Error - No Match Found for NHS Number
PDS Error - NHS Number Matched, but Sensitive Record
PDS Error - NHS Number not Verified
PDS Error - NHS Number Format Incorrect
PDS Error - NHS Number Verified, but Superseded
